subject: Introducing {{intro_name}}
message:
Hi {{first_name}},

How are things going at {{company}}? I'd like to introduce you to [{{intro_name}}]({{intro_linkedin}}). {{intro_description}}.

{{intro_name}}, meet {{first_name}}. {{how_you_met}}. {{intro_strengths}}.

I'll leave it to you two to find a time to connect!

Best,

{{your_name}}
